dict.acceptation: 支撑；支持者；[数学]支集；支撑物；

sent.orig: Software support fuzzy inquiry, support ascending descending order, high support, support in-service upgrades.
sent.trans: 软件支持模糊查询、支持升序降序排列，支持刷新、支持在线升级。

sent.orig: Area sales support teams, key account sales support and technical support officer.
sent.trans: 区域销售支持队伍，大客户销售支持和技术支持。

sent.orig: Support mechanism describes from technical support, financial support and talent.
sent.trans: 支持机制，从技术支持、资金支持和人才支持三方面进行了描述。

sent.orig: In roadway support, bolt support saves cost of support over steel, economic performance is distinctly improved.
sent.trans: 锚杆支护在煤巷支护方面，较型钢支护程度不同地节约了支护费用，经济效益明显提高。

sent.orig: The self adjusting support comprises a rigid support connected with the reactor, and a support beam.
sent.trans: 本实用新型包括与反应器连接的刚性支座和支撑梁。
